title: Mexico : number of households 2005 to 2017
summary: Overall Number of households in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of households in millions is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2015, and finally roughly constant from 2015 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2015.
Maximum Number of households in millions, about 34.07 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Number of households in millions about 28.16 was reached at Year 2010
min_summary: Overall Number of households in millions has increased over the Year.
